verses.roman:
vistāriyā varṇilā tāhā vṛndāvana-dāsa
ei ta' paugaṇḍa-līlāra sūtra-prakāśa

synonyms: vistāriyā—having elaborated; varṇilā—has described; tāhā—that; vṛndāvana-dāsa—Ṭhākura Vṛndāvana dāsa; ei ta'-this is; paugaṇḍa-līlāra—of the pastimes of His early age; sūtra-prakāśa—manifestation of the synopsis.
translation: Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura has elaborately described all these pastimes of the Lord's early age. What I have given is but a condensed presentation of the same pastimes.
